Acropora gemmifera bụ ụdị coral acroporid a na-ahụ na Ọwara nke Aden, Oké Osimiri Uhie, etiti Indo-Pasifik, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na ugwu Indian Ocean, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia, Australia, Oké Osimir Ọwụwa Anyanwụ China, Japan, oké osimiri etiti na ọdịda anyanwụ Osimiri Pasifik, na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Hawaiʻi
Ọ na-apụta na elu okpuru ulo na ndagwurugwu, site na omimi nke 1o15 m
Ọ na-apụta na mpaghara dijitalụ nke nwere nnukwu alaka ndị na-emebi emebi
Alaka nwere otu axial corallite na njedebe na radial corallites na-ahazi n'ahịrị
Corallites axial na-amalite na-adị n'akụkụ ntọala nke alaka
Ọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, na-acha nchara nchara, na-eme ka mmiri ma ọ bụ na-acha odo odo na alaka ya nwere isi ọcha ma ọ bụ acha anụnụ anụcha
Corallites na-acha ntụ ntụ na-acha ọcha, a hụwokwa ụdị dị na Oke osimiri India na corallites na'acha odo odo.

A na-ahazi ya dị ka ụdị na-adịchaghị echegbu onwe ya na IUCN Ndepụta uhie, mana a na-eche na ọnụ ọgụgụ ya na-ebelata n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na mbelata coral zuru ụwa ọnụ, a na-edekwa ya n'okpuru Ndepụta II nke CITES

A maghị ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị bi na ya, mana o yikarịrị ka ọ ga-eyi egwu site na mbelata zuru ụwa ọnụ nke coral reefs, mmụba nke okpomọkụ na-akpata coral na-acha ọcha, mgbanwe ihu igwe, ọrụ mmadụ, okpueze nke ogwu starfish (Acanthaster planci) na ọrịa. Ọ na-eme na Ọwara nke Aden Oké Osimiri Uhie, etiti Indo-Pasifik, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ na ugwu Oké Osimiri India, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia, Australia, Oké Osimari Ọwụwa Anyanwụ China, Japan, oké osimiri etiti na ọdịda anyanwụ Oké Osimiri Pasifik, na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Hawaiʻi.
Brook kọwara ya na 1892 dị ka Madrepora gemmifera
